cause.description:
With this cause maybe we could further develope the lost idea of family. With the break down of the family structure, all since of geniune masculenity has been lost, and all moral makeup has gone out the window. The lack of the family structure is the main cause for abuse, high prison rates, high percantage of inpoverished singles parents, and much more. We are a generation of baby makers, and do not know the real meaning of living. Our families are the foundation of the world we live in, and with this small cause, maybe people will begin to step up and take responsibilty for what must be done. With this small cause the future of our great people with not dwindle away. With thic cause our generation could make an impact on what is defined as family, and make a change for the better.
1. The family is considered to encourage intimacy, love and trust where individuals may escape the competition of dehumanising forces in modern society, and providing love and protection from the rough and tumble industrialised world, and as a place where wa
2. A family is vital in ones life to truly live.
3. The family is the beginning of what is valued, cherished, loved, and what one puts out into the world.
cause.mission: The reinterate the family structure in western lives.
cause.name: Bringing The Family Back
